price: N’ahonyadeε ne deε nensa aka biara ho mma mfasoͻ mma no.
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhu māluhu wamā kasaba
